title: Automotive & Dealer Networks
subtitle: end-to-end execution across OEMs, dealers, and partners

xMatixPlatform.title: Automotive & Dealer Networks
xMatixPlatform.description1: Automotive operations span complex dealer networks, service centres, distributors, and partners. Execution breaks when sales, service, warranty, inventory, and incentives are managed across disconnected systems and organisations.
xMatixPlatform.description2: xMatix enables end-to-end execution for automotive and dealer networks on a single operational foundation, connecting OEMs and dealers with shared data, governed workflows, and real-time visibility.

ecosystemSection.title: The Problem
ecosystemSection.description: Most automotive ecosystems rely on a patchwork of OEM systems, dealer tools, and manual processes. While each participant manages their part of the operation, no platform orchestrates execution across the full network, leading to delays, inconsistencies, and limited control.

ecosystem.title: OEM Core Systems
ecosystem.description: Manage master data, pricing, and reporting but lack visibility into real-time dealer sales, service, and inventory execution.

ecosystem.title: Dealer Sales & Service Systems
ecosystem.description: Operate independently at each dealership, resulting in inconsistent processes, delayed updates, and fragmented customer experience.

ecosystem.title: Warranty & Incentives Platforms
ecosystem.description: Handle claims and incentives separately from execution, causing delays, disputes, and revenue leakage.

ecosystem.title: Reporting & Analytics Tools
ecosystem.description: Provide lagging views of network performance without the ability to influence live dealer execution.

whatIsIt.title: How xMatix Helps
whatIsIt.description2: xMatix acts as the execution layer across automotive dealer networks, unifying sales, service, warranty, inventory, and incentives into a single continuous workflow. Built on the xMatix Platform, Data Fabric, and Sense, it connects OEMs, dealers, and partners through governed execution while preserving local flexibility and enterprise control.

cardLayoutData.title: How {{highlight}}automotive execution{{/highlight}} works on xMatix
cardLayoutData.description: Automotive operations run on a shared execution layer, enabling consistent processes, real-time visibility, and coordinated execution across the dealer network.

features.title: Vehicle Sales & Order Management
features.description: Execute vehicle sales across dealers with real-time pricing, availability, financing rules, and order visibility for OEMs.

features.title: Service & Field Operations
features.description: Coordinate service requests, technician scheduling, parts availability, and SLA execution across dealer service centres.

features.title: Warranty & Claims Execution
features.description: Process warranty claims with consistent rules, faster approvals, and complete traceability from dealer to OEM.

features.title: Inventory, Incentives & Settlement
features.description: Manage vehicle and parts inventory, dealer incentives, and financial settlement with shared data and auditable execution.

requestADemo.heading: See automotive and dealer networks executed on xMatix
requestADemo.description: Request a demo to see how xMatix connects OEMs, dealers, and partners on a single execution platform built for automotive scale and complexity.
